message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1200000. I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it's a great investment.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $950000, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to meet you at $980000, which is a compromise that I think is fair considering the product's value to you. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price.

I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll counteroffer at $970000. I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.

I'm starting to think we're close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $980000, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $975000. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $970000, but I need to stay within my limit. Can you meet me at this price?
